column4: hello, I have a Radeon HD5670, I installed the proprietary drivers, however, video playback is horrible, it isnt slow, but it does stutter
can anybody help me solve that?
totem is solid, but slow in my experience.  Try playing your video back with mplayer, see how it goes.
I am using mplayer, from svn
same problem with vlc and even chromium
Damn.  OK.  I'd just revert back to the opensource drivers then :( sorry.
On my wimpy netbook, I can watch full screen 1080i and 720p video with mplayer, but it's a slideshow with totem.
If you're using a svn of mplayer :) yea, it's the drivers, nothign to do but revert.
what about the opengl driver in mplayer?
Or I suppose you could see if there's a way to set per-user video drivers...make a games user for the ATI driver, other users use the xorg driver?
nah, that would be to troublesome
I figured as much, but it's been something I've been tmepted to try on occasion...
interestingly enough, gl_nosw doesnt seem to have the stutter
